course_description: This course focuses on anesthesia care for trauma and thermal injuries and advanced pain management for acute and chronic conditions. It is designed to solidify the student's theoretical and scientific foundations and critical thinking abilities by applying critical anesthesia concepts in clinical anesthesia practice. Concepts of leadership will be applied to interpersonal and inter-professional communication.
prerequisites: NRSG 689 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
